query:

UNION ALL
SELECT 'plano_individual', COUNT(*) FROM plano_individual
UNION ALL
SELECT 'competencias', COUNT(*) FROM competencias
UNION ALL
SELECT 'trilhas', COUNT(*) FROM trilhas
UNION ALL

UNION ALL

UNION ALL

UNION ALL
SELECT 'ciclo_competencias', COUNT(*) FROM ciclo_competencias
UNION ALL
SELECT 'mentoring_sessions', COUNT(*) FROM mentoring_sessions;
